poem:
Title: "Voices Against The Hush of Dawn"

Shadows speak in tongues of industry,
chiming the hymn of labour's plight.
Wary of hands that wish to thin 
rights from the boughs of the Workers' tree,
fearing the gloom of zero-hour nights.
Union heartbeats, fierce and strong,
echo in the chambers of voters' song.  

(Word count: 44)
